name: SVGLinearGradientElement
description: The SVGLinearGradientElement interface corresponds to the <linearGradient> element.

members.name: SVGLinearGradientElement.x1
members.description: An SVGAnimatedLength corresponding to the x1 attribute of the given <linearGradient> element.

members.name: SVGLinearGradientElement.y1
members.description: An SVGAnimatedLength corresponding to the y1 attribute of the given <linearGradient> element.

members.name: SVGLinearGradientElement.x2
members.description: An SVGAnimatedLength corresponding to the x2 attribute of the given <linearGradient> element.

members.name: SVGLinearGradientElement.y2
members.description: An SVGAnimatedLength corresponding to the y2 attribute of the given <linearGradient> element.
